attributes.action: To change the exisiting fleet of govermental cars to greener vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To demonstrate the governments commitment to reducing carbon emissions and to show the government are commited to tackling climate change. I suggest that all govermental vehicles are changed to greener vehicles to reduce their carbon impact. This then demonstrates the goverments commitment to reducing carbon emissions and leading our country on a greener footing
